title: The Best Compliments for Someone’s Singing or Speaking Voice

steps.title: “Your pitch was absolutely spot on!”
steps.content: “Your pitch was absolutely spot on!”

steps.title: “You have such an amazing tone.”
steps.content: “You have such an amazing tone.”

steps.title: “You have so much power behind your vocals.”
steps.content: “You have so much power behind your vocals.”

steps.title: “You have great control over your voice.”
steps.content: “You have great control over your voice.”

steps.title: “You conveyed the song’s emotion so clearly.”
steps.content: “You conveyed the song’s emotion so clearly.”

steps.title: “That was such a stellar performance!”
steps.content: “That was such a stellar performance!”

steps.title: “I was captivated by your voice as soon as I heard it.”
steps.content: “I was captivated by your voice as soon as I heard it.”

steps.title: “When you sing, your voice fills the room.”
steps.content: “When you sing, your voice fills the room.”

steps.title: “I get so mesmerized when I hear you sing.”
steps.content: “I get so mesmerized when I hear you sing.”

steps.title: “When you got to the chorus, you sounded angelic!”
steps.content: “When you got to the chorus, you sounded angelic!”

steps.title: “This melody sounds even more beautiful when you sing it.”
steps.content: “This melody sounds even more beautiful when you sing it.”

steps.title: “I get chills every time you hit those high notes.”
steps.content: “I get chills every time you hit those high notes.”

steps.title: “Your voice is smooth like velvet.”
steps.content: “Your voice is smooth like velvet.”

steps.title: “You put a lot of soul behind the lyrics.”
steps.content: “You put a lot of soul behind the lyrics.”

steps.title: “I can hear how passionate you are when you sing.”
steps.content: “I can hear how passionate you are when you sing.”

steps.title: “The hard work you put into singing this is so inspirational.”
steps.content: “The hard work you put into singing this is so inspirational.”

steps.title: “You’ve always sounded good, but this was your best!”
steps.content: “You’ve always sounded good, but this was your best!”

steps.title: “You never fail to amaze me with what you can do with your voice.”
steps.content: “You never fail to amaze me with what you can do with your voice.”

steps.title: “All the practice you’ve put in has really paid off!”
steps.content: “All the practice you’ve put in has really paid off!”

steps.title: “I wish you could sing me to sleep every night.”
steps.content: “I wish you could sing me to sleep every night.”

steps.title: “Your version of the song is so much better than the original.”
steps.content: “Your version of the song is so much better than the original.”

steps.title: “You seriously sound just like a rock star.”
steps.content: “You seriously sound just like a rock star.”

steps.title: “I can’t wait to hear your next song.”
steps.content: “I can’t wait to hear your next song.”

steps.title: “I want to put your music on repeat all day.”
steps.content: “I want to put your music on repeat all day.”

steps.title: “Your voice deserves a Grammy.”
steps.content: “Your voice deserves a Grammy.”

steps.title: “Have you ever tried auditioning for The Voice?”
steps.content: “Have you ever tried auditioning for The Voice?”

steps.title: “Your voice is so comforting.”
steps.content: “Your voice is so comforting.”

steps.title: “You have such a warm, welcoming tone.”
steps.content: “You have such a warm, welcoming tone.”

steps.title: “I love how expressive your voice is.”
steps.content: “I love how expressive your voice is.”

steps.title: “I admire how you always sound so confident.”
steps.content: “I admire how you always sound so confident.”

steps.title: “Your voice is as sweet as sugar.”
steps.content: “Your voice is as sweet as sugar.”

steps.title: “I feel a sense of calm rush over me every time I hear your voice.”
steps.content: “I feel a sense of calm rush over me every time I hear your voice.”

steps.title: “You have such a cheery tone, it brightens my day”
steps.content: “You have such a cheery tone, it brightens my day”

steps.title: “I wish I could listen to you all day.”
steps.content: “I wish I could listen to you all day.”

steps.title: “Your voice is perfect for the radio.”
steps.content: “Your voice is perfect for the radio.”

steps.title: “You could read the dictionary out loud and I’d still want to listen.”
steps.content: “You could read the dictionary out loud and I’d still want to listen.”

steps.title: “Your voice is so hypnotic, I’m drawn to you when you start talking.”
steps.content: “Your voice is so hypnotic, I’m drawn to you when you start talking.”

steps.title: “Your voice echoes in my ears even when you aren’t around.”
steps.content: “Your voice echoes in my ears even when you aren’t around.”

steps.title: “I’ll never forget the sound of your voice.”
steps.content: “I’ll never forget the sound of your voice.”

steps.title: “I can’t think of anything I’d want to hear more than your voice right now.”
steps.content: “I can’t think of anything I’d want to hear more than your voice right now.”

steps.title: “The sound of your voice makes me melt.”
steps.content: “The sound of your voice makes me melt.”

steps.title: “I love it when you say my name.”
steps.content: “I love it when you say my name.”

steps.title: “Just hearing your voice makes me weak in the knees.”
steps.content: “Just hearing your voice makes me weak in the knees.”

steps.title: “I was attracted to you as soon as I heard you talk.”
steps.content: “I was attracted to you as soon as I heard you talk.”

steps.title: “Every time I hear you talk, I fall even harder for you.”
steps.content: “Every time I hear you talk, I fall even harder for you.”

steps.title: “You have a really sexy voice.”
steps.content: “You have a really sexy voice.”

steps.title: Husky
steps.content: Husky Someone with a husky voice usually has a lower tone and a slight rasp that sounds really attractive. [1] X Research source They may be making their vocals sound airy to make them feel more intimate.

steps.title: Smoky
steps.content: Smoky If someone has a smoky voice, they sound slightly mysterious in a way that draws you into them. It’s a perfect way to describe someone who has a lower or raspier tone. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Sing-songy
steps.content: Sing-songy A person speaking in a sing-songy tone raises and lowers the pitch of their voice so it sounds like music.

steps.title: Sultry
steps.content: Sultry Sultry is a sweeter way to call someone’s voice sexy or attractive without saying it directly. Use it anytime you want to describe someone with an irresistible voice that gets you excited. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Charismatic
steps.content: Charismatic If a person has a charismatic voice, they sound confident and really easy to talk to.

steps.title: Gruff
steps.content: Gruff A gruff voice sounds low and a little gravelly, so it’s a good word to describe an attractive male voice.

steps.title: Dulcet
steps.content: Dulcet Dulcet means “pleasant to the ears,” so it’s a great way to describe someone with a sweet and soothing tone. [4] X Research source
